search_results.title: Robert Ivie
search_results.snippet: Robert Lynn Ivie is an American academic known for his works on American public rhetoric concerning war and terrorism. Education and career. edit. Ivie ...

search_results.title: Robert L. Ivie - University of Alabama Press
search_results.snippet: Ivie is a professor emeritus of American studies and communication and culture at Indiana University. He is the author of Democracy and America's War on Terror.

search_results.title: Mette Ivie Harrison: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Mette Ivie Harrison grew up in a two-hundred-year-old farmhouse in central New Jersey in a family with eleven children, a dog, a pony, and lots of chickens.
